text:
For the vss tasks (get, label, history, checkin, and checkout), serverPath is 
documented as an available attribute but not actually supported.  

Although there is the workaround of setting SSDIR to the server path there is 
the descrepency in the documentation stateing that it is available.
creator: msuydam@acm.org
conor@apache.org
text: Would you like to submit a patch for the documentation?

creator: msuydam@acm.org
text:
After further investigation this is not a bug and serverPath is working 
correctly.  

Apparently this bug only manifests itself when the user has had too little 
sleep, is developing early in the morning, and can't SPELL.
